body: mutation {updatecustomer (customer: {id: "b5803b28-c584-4bb3-8fac-3315b91686b3", email: "test2@test.com", firstname: "Test", lastname: "Test", phone: "1234567890", address: { line1: "123 Test St.", line2: "Apartment 3", city: "Portland", state: "OR", zip: "97213", country: "US" }, creditcards:["df84f7bb-06bd-4daa-b1a3-6a2c113edd72"] } ) { id, email, firstname, lastname, phone, created_at, updated_at, address { line1, city, state, zip, country }, creditcards { id, number, expiration, ccv, name, address { line1, line2, city, state, zip } } } }
